Title: GNU C Library: Multiple vulnerabilities
Synopsis:
Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in the GNU C Library, the
    worst of which may allow execution of arbitrary code.

Background.Text: The GNU C library is the standard C library used by Gentoo Linux systems.

Description.Text: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in the GNU C Library. Please review the CVE identifiers and Qualysâ€™ security advisory referenced below for details.

Impact.Text: An attacker could possibly execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process, escalate privileges or cause a Denial of Service condition.

Workaround.Text: There is no known workaround at this time.

P.Text: All GNU C Library users should upgrade to the latest version:

URI.Text: Qualys Security Advisory - The Stack Clash
